actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 843 of the Public Health Service Act to provide for deferment of repayment of loans to students of nursing for periods during which they are receiving training as nurse anesthetists.

summary.text: Provides for the deferment of repayment of loans under the Public Health Service Act to students of nursing for periods during which they are receiving training as nurse anesthetists.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 843 of the Public Health Service Act to provide for deferment of repayment of loans to students of nursing for periods during which they are receiving training as nurse anesthetists.
